thread.title: Grown so Fast
thread.title_full: Grown so Fast - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jhun R
title: Grown so Fast
text:
This hotel have grown so fast that I cannot even raise to their location or to the place where they are at now.
When I started staying at their hotel, the staff have stricken my attention just for a simple accommodation I requested when we got there (it was a strong snow falling then). It is that simple that I expected it to be granted. And we checked- in. My point here is , those situations that clients or guest is a given that it can happen or possible that it happens a number of times. But the way the staff handled it was so simple that great to me because this hotel was the only one so far that delivers that quality of customer service. Its genuinely expressed. Which is not too evident among this days to most of the hotels. Everything is $, I understand that. But can it be decent enough to express to guest that it will not that be seen as greed from clients.
I hope Cambria have hired a lot of this staff that has this positive attitude. Since I learned that the personnel already resigned. Thanks and more power.
Room Tip: They only have 2 rooms that has balcony. I don't know if the front desk lied to me then but only... See more room tips
